Title: Chapter 17
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Laura Eason
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Mahershala Ali, Molly Parker
Plot: A Terror threat traps Francis in the Congress building with a bitter Donald Blythe. Claire gives a live interview that shakes the media.
